term.title: weighted mean

item.text: If in a series of observations a statistical weight(w i) is assigned to each value, a weighted mean x ̄ w can be calculated by the formula:

item.alttext: x ̄ w = ∑ w i x i ∑ w i

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 595. 'Nomenclature for the presentation of results of chemical analysis (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 599 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466030595)
